//testcase Helper

    //BitToInt
        binToInt("00000000000000000000000000000001"),1
        binToInt("00000000000000000000000000000010"),2
        binToInt("00000000000000000000000000000000"),0
        binToInt("00000000000000000000000000001111"),15
        binToInt("00000000000000000000000000010001"),17
        binToInt("11111111111111111111111111111111"),-1
        binToInt("10101010101000000000000000000000"),-1432354816
        binToInt("00111111100111000000000000001111"),1067188239
        binToInt("11111111111111111010100011010101"),-22315
        binToInt("00000000000001010010100001110010"),338034


        
    ------------------------------------------------------

    //IntToBit
        IntTobin(2),"00000000000000000000000000000010"
        IntTobin(-1),"11111111111111111111111111111111"
        IntTobin(-15),"11111111111111111111111111110001"
        IntTobin(2321233),"00000000001000110110101101010001"
        IntTobin(321412),"00000000000001001110011110000100"
        IntTobin(20),"00000000000000000000000000010100"
        IntTobin(-1023),"11111111111111111111110000000001"
        IntTobin(-12313),"11111111111111111100111111100111"
        IntTobin(123),"00000000000000000000000001111011"
        IntTobin(5012),"00000000000000000001001110010100"
